originalText.text:
The law firm of Kreindler&Kreindler represented me in my VCF claim they are first class firm and Charles was a real professional courteous I highly recommend them in all your lawyer needs I can't thank them enough healthy new year to all at the firm
Vincent Vazzana

originalText.text: If anyone needs a good law firm for 9/11 issues or other matters I highly recommend the law firm of Kriendler and Kriendler LLP.  I had several 9/11 issues over the years that they handled.  Recently the attorney I dealt with directly was Rashad Ali.  He was highly knowledgeable and concerned with my issues.  Any problems or questions I had, he quickly responded to resolve them.  He truly was considerate, caring, and treated me like family.  If it wasn’t for the hard work of Rashad and Noah Kushlefsky my case would not have been resolved as quickly as it was.  They are truly great lawyers to handle any issue you may have.

originalText.text:
In the fall of 2020, a friend who was with me downtown on 9/11 recommended contacting Rashad Ali at Kreindler & Kreindler. It was great advice. During the last two and a quarter years, Rashad has treated me courteously and professionally. During each step of the claims process, Rashad was there to provide expert guidance and advice. He patiently answered all my questions and explained what to expect and what would happen next. There's a lot of paperwork involved, but Rashad helped me fill out everything.

I'm not a fan of lawyers, but Kreindler & Kreindler has earned my trust. They were honest and efficient and human. Rashad never let me get discouraged or feel lost. He was figuratively by my side every step of the journey. And when Rashad finally gave me the good news that we had been successful, he seemed genuinely happy. That meant a lot to me.

If you have a 9/11 claim, I can wholeheartedly recommend Kreindler & Kreindler. Ask for Rashad Ali. I am so appreciative that Rashad and the firm worked hard for me during the process and got me an excellent result.

Charles Coleman

originalText.text:
worked with Kreindler and Kreindler to handle my father's
claim as he was a bus operator during the 9/11 attacks and
that was his route. My father drove his bus back and forth
transporting patrons to safety. He was diagnosed with
cancer and passed away from the fumes. Kreindler and
Kreindler worked very diligently in getting my families claim
approved. Danielle Berman was very instrumental in getting
the claim approved. She was very diligent, honest, hard
working, knowledgeable and kept me informed every step of
the way. If she is an example of what her firm represents; a
firm with integrity and professionalism, I would not hesitate
hiring them and I would refer them to anyone. Kreindler and
Kreindler was the best decision I made for my legal needs.

originalText.text:
From start to present day Charles Allard has been with me every step of the way collaborating with me on the whole process always keeping me up to date on the claims status. He is a credit to his firm and I am very happy to have him in my corner. With Staff like Charles Allard on their team I found Kreindler & Kreindler  to be an excellent law firm and would not hesitate to use them in the future. Thanks
Harold Knowles
